creator: fulton@cmu.edu
text:
Build instructions for Lenya 1.4 state that Lenya, by default, looks for the Cocoon source tree at:
../cocoon-2.1.7

Lenya 1.4.x from SVN is setup to look for it at:
../../cocoon/branches/BRANCH_2_1_X

If this is an SVN-only issue, it would help to make note of it in the build instructions.

Can you give me additional information where you mean? 
in the readme, install-src files or on the lenya webpage?

I'll take care on that
creator: oliver.schalch@wyona.com
oliver.schalch@wyona.com
text: this is anyway solved, because we have the cocoon in /externals now.
